template_data.caption: A map showing Teyla Shan sheltering Semphar from the Hordelands.
template_data.name: Teyla Shan

document_data.caption: A map showing Teyla Shan sheltering Semphar from the Hordelands.
document_data.name: Teyla Shan
document_data.mainbody: '''Teyla Shan''', or the '''Godswatch Mountains''', formed much of the border of eastern [[Semphar]], essentially separating the country from the vast plains of the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: Teyla Shan ran roughly north to south from the [[River Estan]] in the north to the pass of [[Howling Gap]] in the south.
document_data.Description: One of the mountain range's most prominent peaks, [[Shan Karsha]], was found in the southeast region overlooking the [[Silk Road]].
document_data.History: When the manifestations of the [[god]]s of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi]] and the [[Untheric pantheon]]s came to [[Toril]], they landed in the highest peaks of the Teyla Shan. There, they further divided their power to create the incarnations that fought against the [[Imaskari]].
